sentences.en: Can you translate the instructions in this manual for a layman?
sentences.cn: 你能为外行翻译这份手册的使用说明 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is a layman in politics.
I must admit I a layman as far as insurance is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我得承认,就保险而言,我是个外行.

sentences.en: I must admit I'm a layman as far as insurance is concerned.
sentences.cn: 我应该承认,就保险而沦,我是个外行.

sentences.en: I'm a layman. What I'm going to say may expose myself to ridicule, yet I still want to say a few words.
sentences.cn: 我是个外行, 我说的话可能贻笑大方, 可我还是要说几句.

sentences.en: If you don’t understand what the doctor says, ask to have it explained in layman’s terms (= in simple language ).
sentences.cn: 如果你听不懂医生的话，就请他用通俗易懂的语言来解释一下。

sentences.en: In 1932, one Boston layman wrote to Archbishop William O'Connell in support of Father Coughlin.
sentences.cn: 1932年，波士顿一名平信徒致函大主教威廉·奥康奈尔，声援库格林神父。

sentences.en: In the language of the layman the Epicrustal rocks can best be described as the'scum. "
sentences.cn: 用外行人的话来说,浅成岩最好称为 “ 浮渣 ”.

sentences.en: The layman is generally more concerned with their possible unethical uses.
sentences.cn: 外行人通常担心它们可能产生非道德的用途.

sentences.en: The mere mention of the words "heart failure", can conjure up, to the layman, the prospect of imminent death.
sentences.cn: 一提“心脏衰竭”四字，外行人就联想到命不久矣的情景。

sentences.en: The occasion is great, but I'm no judge of music, I'm only a layman.
sentences.cn: 场面倒是挺宏大的, 但我对音乐不懂, 我是门外汉.

sentences.en: The specialized manual has to be translated into layman's terms.
sentences.cn: 必须要用非专业的语言来解释这本专业手册.

sentences.en: The subject matter was so technical as to be beyond the ken of the average layman.
sentences.cn: 该主题专业性太强，一般的外行人很难理解。

sentences.en: There are basically two types called, in layman's terms, blue and white asbestos.
sentences.cn: 基本上有两种，用外行话说就是青石棉和白石棉。

sentences.en: These technical terms are difficult for the layman to understand.
sentences.cn: 这些专门术语是外行人难以理解的.

sentences.en: To the layman (= laymen in general ) all these plants look pretty similar.
sentences.cn: 对外行的人来说，这些植物看起来都很相似。

sentences.en: Where the law is concerned , I am only a layman.
sentences.cn: 谈到法律, 我不过是门外汉.
